item.title: Job Search Reflection
item.description: General requirements After several successful and unsuccessful research and internship experiences, I think I wanna a position that has the following general features: Intellectual Challenging Problems Collaborative and Supportive Colleagues Healthy, enriched personal growth and career developments Real impacts on users, products, systems and companies Problem Solving The problems are interesting, exciting, and challenging, so that I am excited to solve them and can feel sense of achievement for providing a solution.
